title: "/clue"

[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

Send your minion to complete clue scrolls.

**Usage**

- `/clue tier:<string> [quantity:<integer>] [implings:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `tier` | `string` | Yes | The clue you want to do. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity of clues you want to complete (optional). | - |
| `implings` | `string` | No | Implings to use for multiple clues per trip. | - |

**Examples**

- `/clue tier:easy`
